SeedSettings.AdminEmail: Set To Your Default Admin Email
SeedSettings.AdminUsername: Set To Your Default Admin Username
SeedSettings.AdminFirstName: Set To Your Default Admin First Name
SeedSettings.AdminSurname: Set To Your Default Admin Surname

JwtBearer.SecurityKey: 256 Bit Key To Sign JWT Using HmacSha256

Twilio.AccountSid: Set to your Twilio Account SID
Twilio.AuthToken: Set to your Twilio Auth Token
Twilio.VerificationSid: Set to your Verify Service SID
